howToPlay.title: How to Play
howToPlay.description: Mahjong Titans is easy to learn but requires strategy and patience to master. The goal is to remove all tiles from the board by matching pairs. You can only select 'free' tiles (those with at least one side exposed) to match.

tips.title: Game Tips
tips.observe: Survey the Board: Take a moment to study the entire layout before making your first move
tips.topLayer: Clear the Top: Focus on removing top-layer tiles to reveal more options below
tips.rareCards: Target Rare Tiles: Prioritize matching less common tiles like Winds or Dragons
tips.balance: Keep it Balanced: Try to remove tiles evenly across the board to avoid isolated tiles
tips.undo: Use Undo Wisely: Don't hesitate to use the undo feature if you find yourself stuck
tips.memory: Train Your Memory: Try to remember the positions of tiles you've seen but couldn't match yet
